items.title: Goal Setting Success: Formulas and Strategies That Work
items.headline: Learn how to find your success with this secret goal setting formula to achieve your goals.
objectives_summary: Reach their goals using a top secret goal setting formula!
You will also gain the understand and awareness of how to achieve anything your heart desires goal setting.
After studying this course, students will be able to apply the top secret formula in all aspects of their lives including: Finances, Health, Well-Being, Relationships, and so much more!

items.title: Life Coaching Certification
items.headline: Become a competent Life Coach, learn powerful Life Coaching techniques and build a successful coaching practice
objectives_summary: After taking this course you will know how to help clients change their thinking patterns and destructive behavior and improve their life quality.
How to create a strong rapport with clients and have great results as a life coach
How to build a successful coaching practice

Learn how to easily choose an optimistic, positive attitude (Stop negative thinking and bad moods in their tracks)
Learn how to create the emotions you want (Stop feeling out of control emotionally)

items.title: Overcoming Shyness and Social Anxiety
items.headline: Loneliness is epidemic: Learn how to break out of feeling invisible and gain social confidence.
objectives_summary: You will understand social and emotional principles and skills.
Understand exactly what causes shyness and social anxiety.
Learn the most effective strategies for comfortably overcoming shyness & social anxiety.

items.headline: Learn to assert yourself to achieve your dreams and your desires. Live a richer, more confident, more fulfilling life.

Articulate characteristics of assertive people
Discern differences between assertive, aggressive, and passive communication

items.title: Reveal And Empower Your Life Purpose Through Yoga Nidra
items.headline: Create a conscious meaningful life via the ancient tantric practice of Yoga Nidra to bring your greatest gifts forward
objectives_summary: Define the primary purpose of your life and learn to align fully with what is happening in the present moment.
Discover ancient yogic concepts and how to use them today for health, healing and discovering your life purpose
Understand how to utilise the benefits of Yoga Nidra to discover your life purpose for personal development
